title: Drawing, "Road through the Blue Mountains, near Homestead, Jamaica", August 1865
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center: Lugt 457d
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at bottom right:  Jamaica / Aug // 65
Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at center right:  Homestead, in Blue mts.
description: Horizontal view of a road winding toward the background along steep mountain sides in the foreground and middleground, with mountains visible in the left background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Road through the Blue Mountains, near Homestead, Jamaica", August 1865.
August 1865. Graphite on greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-440.
